text: Hezbe Wahdat () is one of the political parties of the Hazara people in Afghanistan, which was founded in 1989. The main founder and leader of this party was Abdul Ali Mazari, who was killed by the Taliban in March 1995. == Related pages == * Abdul Ali Mazari == References == == Other websites == * www.wahdat.net Category:Politics of Afghanistan
title: Hezbe Wahdat
